name: Accio
description: Pulls nearby item drops towards the caster
configurability: Radius (how close items need to be)

name: Aguamenti
description: Places a block of water on the target block

name: Alarte Ascendare
description: Propels the target upwards

name: Alohomora
description: Opens up iron doors and doors locked by Colloportus

name: Aparecium
description: Makes nearby players visible

name: Arania Exumai
description: Damages and knocks back spiders

name: Avada Kedavra
description: Instantly kills the target

name: Avis
description: Shoots a flock of birds (chickens) from your wand

name: Bauleo
description: Absorbs all nearby items into a nearby chest

name: Bubble-head Charm
description: Refills the target's air bar to full

name: Colloportus
description: Locks single/double doors

name: Confringo
description: Launches an explosive fireball from your wand

name: Confundo
description: Applies the confusion effect to the target

name: Crucio
description: Tortures the target

name: Deprimo
description: Applies the slowness effect to the target and forces the target to sneak
target: Living Entity (only players are forced to sneak)

name: Duro
description: Turns a block into stone

name: Episkey
description: Applies the regeneration effect to the target

name: Evanesco
description: Makes the caster invisible

name: Expelliarmus
description: Disarms the target (removes in-hand wand and drops it)
configurability: Disarm swords and bows as well as wands

name: Finite Incantatem
description: Removes all potion effects and unpetrifies the target (undoes Petrificus Totalus)

name: Flame-freezing Charm
description: Gives the caster the fire resistance potion effect

name: Glacius
description: Traps the target in a case of ice

name: Homenum Revelio
description: Reveals players near the caster
configurability: Firework color, Area where players are revealed

name: Incendio
description: Sets the target on fire

name: Legilimens
description: Shows the target player's inventory

name: Magna Tonitrus
description: Calls down a bolt of lightning

name: Multicorfors
description: Changes the dye color of the target

name: Obscuro
description: Applies the blindness effect to the target
target: Living Entity (erases targeted player if mob)

name: Orchideous
description: Plants a rose on the target

name: Petrificus Totalus
description: Petrifies the target, cancelling movement

name: Point Me
description: Sets the player's view to the north

name: Reducto
description: Creates an explosion at the target
configurability: Replace blocks that have been destroyed

name: Refilling Charm
description: Refills bowls with mushroom soup, and buckets with water or milk

name: Reparo
description: Repairs all items and equipped armor in the caster's inventory

name: Sectumsempra
description: Slowly damages the target

name: Silencio
description: Mutes the target

name: Sonorus
description: Broadcasts the caster's next message (global chat)

name: Spongify
description: Cancels fall damage

name: Stupefy
description: Confuses and weakens the target
configurability: Vertical & horizontal knockbacks, damage, confusion & weakness durations

name: Wingardium Leviosa
description: Allows temporary flight for the caster
